name: Grand Theft Auto 2D Edition (Fanmade)
description: A fun driving game with a cash and radio system based off of gta 2, developed by fadendra on youtube and tested by schorchyan gaming, this was mostly just a training project so that I can learn coding more and make better games in the future, if you enjoyed all I ask is you subscribe to me on youtube, or if you didn't, just click off the game.
